summary: Want to make your night time more enjoyable to look at? By downloading this pack, you get a nicer looking planet called Tranquility with high density stars at night.
descriptionHtml:
Tranquility Planet - This planet was originally from akindain with the mod called \"Moon texture replacer pack\" and was edited by me (sareg155) to make it more interesting by giving the planet a glow and better shading.
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=51

Enhanced Night Stars (High Density) - This mod is originally from CptJoker71 with the mod called \"Enhanced Night Skyrim\" and remains unedited.
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=85

INSTALLATION
Extract to or copy to your main Skyrim folder which contains the executable
C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim for Window 7 users
 (replace C to hard drive that your steam is installed to)

UNINSTALLATION
Remove all masser_, moonshadow, skymoonfull and skystars DDS files from
C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\Sky

TOOLS USED
Adobe Photoshop CS5
NVIDIA DDS Plugin (http://developer.nvidia.com/nvidia-texture-tools-adobe-photoshop)
Textures from CptJoker (Stars) and akindain (Planet)
author: Todd Fortune
